reviews.review_text: A great fine and dine just in front of the English Bay beach. You got to the see the best sunset from the patio, at the hook! The food is tasty, and it will bring mouth watery flavours to you. A great sea food experience, the one you wont experience anywhere else. Food service at its best, servers are so welcoming, friendly and their recommendations are great. Beers, Lagers, Ale, wine, and speciality cocktails name it any, and they will have for you at the bar. The best oysters with the best standards. Perfectly shucked. Come and have a experience!

Fantastic experience from beginning to end! Everyone loved the food - the only comment the even resembled criticism was the angry pasta could have been angrier (spicier) but so many dishes had us talking about them days later: baked oysters, sliders, asparagus, Brussels sprouts, seafood mac and cheese, the mocktails, cookies & ice cream  it was the highlight meal on our trip! The staff was beyond accommodating and everyone we interacted with was genuine, cheerful, and each an absolute delight! We were a group of 8 with small children and we wandered in without reservations and we were treated to a fantastic meal. I can t recommend this place enough!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shawna! Thanks so much for the great review.  We will pass on the feedback to our Chef.  We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great service here! I was here with a few friends on the fireworks festival. Although we were here kinda the last minute they still gladly arranged seats for us. We sat at the corner seat which is a gorgeous seat with a full view of the beach. The food here are also awesome, which although there aren t that many choice of food dishes, this is still a highly recommended restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ian! Thank you so much for your review- very happy we were able to accommodate you :)

reviews.review_text: The best beach side restaurant in Vancouver! The vibes in there are awesome. The service is absolutely bang on. Jonah, Theo and Sham gave us such an unreal experience at Hook. From the stunning drinks to the unreal shucking, the staff there treat their guests like family. Making sure to ask for your names and give you a good experience. Their seafood and oysters are the freshest I ve ever had and the biggest oysters I ve ever eaten in my life! This is the restaurant to go to not only for the food but for the service. Our new fave spot in the West End!

One of the best restaurant experiences we ve had in Vancouver! We had an event there and everything was absolutely perfect. The chef there is incredible talented, the staff was so friendly and attentive, and the manager Axel made sure it all ran smoothly. We watched the sunset through through the windows while everything unfolded perfectly. Everyone kept raving about the service, food and atmosphere. I would give more stars if I could. Thanks again for one of the best nights!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amanda thank you so much! The event was so beautiful and we were thrilled to have the opportunity to host you! Thanks for the review!

reviews.review_text: I ve been to Hook a couple times now and it s always been great. On my last trip the server Bre was amazing with our group. We had a couple different people with a lot of different orders and she took great care of us. The burger is a classic and the Miraval Rose was amazing.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Yohan! Thank you so much for the review!

reviews.review_text: Amazing food quality!  Clams is highly recommended! Awesome view at English Bay. Servers are really friendly and so kind. Come and enjoy your meal with your friends!

Three of us had dinner 11/11. The food was amazing. Hot and fresh and delicious. And the service was absolutely top notch. They went above and beyond to get me a drink I wanted. We re from Regina and always love coming back to Hook. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Gaynor, Glad you enjoyed your experience! Well see you on your next trip to Vancouver!

reviews.review_text: Tonight, ten of my friends and I went to this bar on the occasion of one of our friends birthday and ordered drinks and sides. What caught our attention the most was the very lovely waiter there.  He was (I think his name is Theo) very accommodating, friendly and thorough and we will definitely go there again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Arash! Thanks for sharing your feedback and we are so happy to hear that our staff helped make your visit enjoyable.  We look forwared to seeing you again!

reviews.review_text: Our food was delicious! We settled on a few appetizers from the happy hour menu. The setting was nice. We watched the sunset over the water from our table. The service was great! I don t eat dairy and our server was very accommodating. He had the kitchen fix mussels and clams in a way that wasn t on the menu so that I could enjoy them. Dietary restrictions: I don t eat dairy and our server was very accommodating. He had the kitchen fix mussels and clams in a way that wasn t on the menu so that I could enjoy them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Janet! We are happy to hear that we could accomdate and that you enjoyed your meal.  We hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Great view, good seafood. Fantastic place to host a business lunch - 5 of us squeezed into a booth and it went well! Awesome servers. Would repeat
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Earl - appreciate your review and thanks for helping us showcase our menu! Look forward to hosting your team anytime!

reviews.review_text: Three nights on English Beach.  Three different restaurants here.  This was the BEST!  Great service.  Fresh oysters were fabulous here best ever.  Salmon bowl was inventive and tasty.  Most importantly, their dirty martini with house vodka was the best I ve had in years!  The only negative is that the menu is quite limited. Our group of 6 found appealing choices, but a broader array of possibilities would help.  We loved this place!

Nice to hang out at English Bay. Came here for happy hour on a bright sunny day and it was very good. Tried a margarita, beer, prawns and home made chips with salsa and guacamole. Everything was good and would come back again. It was very busy so there might be a wait on those nice sunny days.
Hook on Denman in English Bay is a nice pub/restaurant. Usually there is a line up especially weekends. Nice place to hang out.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Farid! Please remember you can always book a table through OpenTable to skip the line!

reviews.review_text: Super chill place! staff were extremely helpful and kind, food was well worth the price especially with view of the beach and drinks were 10/10! Margaritas and their calamari were especially incredible, i would definitely come back here and recommend checking it out! (Also pictured is Fish&Chips, Chicken wings, Pulled pork Poutine and the Calamari)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your review. We are glad you had a great time. Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: My husband and I had a lovely lunch.  We accessed the restaurant through the adjacent bar as my husband is in a wheelchair. The staff were super helpful, particularly Mackenzie, the food was great and the views stunning. Fabulous end to our Canadian holiday.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the great review, Beverly! We hope to see you again next time you visit Canada. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Great seafood with a nice sea view. Nice service and fantastic food, with great happy hour choices
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Fabio, thanks for the great review! See you soon

reviews.review_text: We had Theo as a server and it was the BEST experience ever. Would 10/10 recommend a visit and ask to be seated in Theo s section!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Emilia! We are so happy to hear you had a geat experience with us. See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: We really liked this place...nice view, awesome staff and great drinks. We came back a second time also. We tries the lobster roll and the tuna salad. The lobster was really good and enough to eat. The salad was amazing!!! The drinks were really well prepared...we were seated next to the bar. We tried 2 very different cocktails and were awesome. The staff wear masks and were paying attention to the customers.

I had the privilege of trying some of the new dishes to be added to the menu in July by Executive Chef Arif Khalid. From a very delicate Red Snapper Cerziche (paired with pinot gris) to a great burger or the steak (w merlot), everything was delicious!! Hook is a casual dining experience facing west overlooking English Bay. A wonderful view at sunset. Lots of craft beer. The ceiling could use some sound dampening material as the noise level is a bit bright.

Lovely restaurant in a good location. Great views and fantastic food at very reasonable prices for the quality. Would recommend! Had a great atmosphere - slight caveat is the noise. If youre hard of hearing it may be difficult to hold a conversation. But otherwise excellent!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Charlotte.  Thank you for the 5 star review! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you visit again soon.

reviews.review_text: We fell in love with Eva. Great server, lots of personality. Saw her work an entire room and made every table feel special. Food was a tad pricey.. but considering the location, it was justifiable. Proportions were not large, but had a lot of flavour. They seem to slant toward quality over quantity. Loved the $6 / 20oz pints (finally.. a ma fa&kin proper pint!). I d return.

In from Calgary, and happened to walk in for some afternoon drinks and food. Nicholas was our waiter, he was absolutely fantastic, have been to Vancouver many times and is a great representation of what Vancouver has to offer. He shared his knowledge of the city and even called ahead of our next reservation to make sure we were taken care of there. Great host!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Marc! That is wonderful to hear, thank you for sharing your review! Hope to see you soon.

reviews.review_text: I enjoyed my cocktail and oysters there. My bourbon sour was very balanced and the view is nice! I havent tried their food yet, but maybe I will get their burger at some point to test the waters.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! Our Axelito Sour has been very popular so thank you!

reviews.review_text: 5 star all the way       !  Amazing vibes, friendly and efficient service and most importantly yummylicious food.  We had yam fries, fish tacos,  baja rice bowl and finally chocolate brownie cheese cake.  Everything was finger licking good, literally!  Would definitely go there again.

This is a great place for locals and tourists. Right at Beach and Denman you feel the city beach energy. Great views of the water and great people watching. Food is fresh and very good. Portions are generous too. The fish and chips are some of the best I ve had. The oysters come with several tasty condiments. Happy hour is a fabulous deal. My only disappointment is that the crab wasn t Dungeness.

Very good restaurant, the food is amazing, portions are generous and quality outstanding!!  Our server Nicholas made of our evening a fantastic experience. The owner was present and came to talk with us. We highly this place. You will be hooked ;-)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi David!  Thanks so much for the great review.  We are so happy you enjoyed your time with Nicholas and the rest of the team.  See you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Love this place, such good seafood! I ordered the blackened cod, and it was soo good. Very tender flaky cod, seasoned perfectly, on a bed of asparagus and crushed whole mini potatoes. My wife ordered the vege burger, although it fell apart easily it was still delicious. Service was really good, seating was awesome and the view was awesome.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words Saadiq. The way you describe our food makes me hungry!

reviews.review_text: Great seafood/bar in English bay area with a nice sunset view from their patio. Everything I have ordered from their menu has been amazing (And I have ordered pretty much everything on their menu at this point  ). Great vibes and great service too. Highly recommend

Absolutely lovely. They reserved my sister and I a window seat and we got am Absolutely STUNNING sunset while we ate/drank. I had the prawn roll and I loved it. Sister had the fish and chips and she loved it (though her portion size was humongous, so not all of it).
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review Sam, we are very lucky to have such a beautiful sunset view!

reviews.review_text: What a great place for good food great views and the staff was amazing from Christen (hope I spelled that right)our waiter who never let us want for anything and super suggestions and full of great information about the area to Dustin the manager who greeted us both days we were there and made sure everything was satisfactory if we lived in Vancouver but we live in Pittsburgh PA we would be regulars.  Nice meeting you all keep it going

Food: The chicken sandwich is very salty, but juicy. The fries are just okay. The premium oyster are delicious. The lamp chops are amazing. Drinks: The local beers are pretty good. Ambience: Gorgeous view of the beach. Seating inside and outside. The chairs are all outdoor design. There is leather booths inside. Elegant designs for the area.

Great happy hour selection! We had the seared prawns that were to die for and their calamari was exciting to eat with the jalapeno, tomatoes and arugula. There s also a pool table that s free to play. During our visit we had caused some confusion as we left our table to go play pool. When we came back to our table, another guest was seated which led us to thinking that we had paid already. They had instead moved us to a table nearer to the pool table and we mistakenly left without paying. When we called back, after realizing a few hours later, to let them know of the situation and what we could do to transfer the missed payment, our waitress, Eva, had informed us that they had already taken care of it even though it was our fault. We will for sure come back to Hook to try out other things on their menu and to leave a generous tip!

They accommodated our group of six by moving us to a better table with a view. It was a friends birthday and they made sure it was special for her. The food arrived at random times, but each item was worth the wait.

The best Caesars Ive ever had in Vancouver. It was dressed w a jumbo prawn the size of a coaster, pepperoni, crab claw and fresh horse radish. Staff and service were bomb. Pretty sure we met everyone in the front crew, servers, bartenders, managers... they made us feel super welcome and spoiled us. Were definitely coming back w more cash!
Food was good..gorgeous spot! We watched the sunset at happy hour and had nice cocktails. Had lovely truffle fries and calamari.

Great food on the raw bar, fantastic happy hour specials, beer on tap, and an extremely helpful and kind staff! This was our first time here with a larger group of 6 people and we had a wonderful experience. Definitely a must stop when I m the area!

Prompt and friendly service with a unique menu. The food was great and the hand made tortilla chips were delicious. Great view of English Bay from both inside the restaurant and the patio. Bonus surprise, theres a pool table!

Highly recommend this restaurant   it is VIBE. We went there and ordered a bottle of wine which was so tasty ( Friend) also we had Burrata & Focaccia which was delicious with amazing seasonings. The staff are an amazing and so professional. Definitely I ll check it out soon

Hook is one of English Bay s gems. I love to go for the fantastic view on the patio, great service, and excellent beer selection. Shout out to Eva, who always provides amazing service and wine and beer recs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So kind Jasmine, thank you!

reviews.review_text: Beautiful setting, the food was great and fairly priced ! We all loved our meal and we will be back
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review, Charlene! See you again soon. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: Came here after being treated like trash at Cactus Club across the street. Great service, food and drinks.Friendly staff. Way better option than Craptus Club. Highly recommended. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: It was wonderful to meet you both! Please come back and visit us soon!

reviews.review_text: Very good service, good food and good environment. Very nice, well trained and friendly staff. They give you many reasons to come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great review, Hamidreza! We look forward to seeing you again!

reviews.review_text: Perfect place to go to thats pretty much on the water. The vibe is very relaxed and calming with the music and the staff are very polite and welcoming. Food and drinks were great, as well as the perfect view of the ocean. Would definitely recommend.

Not sure if it was the seafood tower or my server but it was almost like love at first sight! Eva was articulate and charming and the food she recommended was the best. My favourite dishes are the sablefish, the anchovy toast, shishito peppers and the beet salad
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Justin! Thanks so much for the lovely review, much appreciated!

reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic place!!  Theo was the best server we have had in a long time!  Lots of fun and energy!  Thanks for a great time and best fish!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stacey, thank you so much for your review. Have to agree, Theo is fantastic! See you soon :)

reviews.review_text: Been coming here for years now, mainly for the amazing service from the sweet employee, Eva. She never fails to brightens up my day. Your hospitality is amazing my friend, food is always great and your energy is unshakeable!!! So thank you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Melissa!

reviews.review_text: Great food, affordable seafood dishes. Stop by for the happy hour deal for some drinks and snacks! Mango habanero sauce for oysters was absolutely amazing!
Wow! What a location, and what fantastic food! Try the fish and chips, you wont be sorry (I want the recipe for that coleslaw, its the best Ive ever had).

This is my favourite spot on English Bay in @YVR. @HookSeabar is located in a perfect spot with its oceanside view across. I really enjoy their tasty meals and great selection of menu items and drinks. I had several patio drinks here with a few groups of friends during our COVID summer. I will definitely be coming back for the salads. A good selection of small bites. During COVID, dine in or take out via Uber Eats. Support your local restaurants during these times.
Amazing salad with tuna :) Fantastic staff. As my son did not like much meatbolls cause they were too spicy, he got ice cream as a compensation :)
We had a really good time having dinner on a patio. Friendly service and good food, what else do you need?
had an awesome time. Great place to have dinner especially if you re looking for a chill place to have a drink and snack. Eva was an amazing server and made me feel right at home.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ray - thank you for the review! Look forward to having you in again.

reviews.review_text: We had Bre as our server on the patio! She went above and beyond to make us feel looked after! She was so friendly and attentive and made sure to check in on what we needed whether it was a drink, a snack or the heaters! We watched the sunset on the patio and continued to order more rounds because of her!! Honestly such a rockstar server !! Will defs be back again because of Bre!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lexy! Thank you so much for taking the time to share this lovely review - I will make sure to pass your compliments on to Bre!

reviews.review_text: Aug 10 Ive never been to The Hook , reading the reviews about the restaurant are all very good. It seems like a great place to work I pass by The Hook one time when I was on the bus .
Decent spot! Really wanted to leave a review for our server, Bre (like the cheese!) though. Sat on the patio and she made the evening perfect for us. 5.1/5 for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!

reviews.review_text: nice ambiance, good food, Eva was the best server we couldve had!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jenna!

reviews.review_text: Great food in an awesome location. The patio on a sunny spring day was A+. My wife and I really enjoyed our brunch here. Worth every penny.
I always have the best time here! Especially on the patio, Eva and Breanna always make my friends and I feel so welcome! This is the best place for oysters by the beach!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Siobahn!

reviews.review_text: always amazing food especially come for margaritas. the service was great i had breanna she took such great care of us she was so attentive and made us feel so well looked after!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jaden!

reviews.review_text: Fantastic service, everything was fast and food came out quickly. We had 12 oysters, $2 a shuck. The beat salad and brussel sprouts were delicious. Also the seafood pasta. Right on English Bay. Great affordable spot! No reso needed either :)

Walked in for dinner with no reservations and got a table right away with incredible views of English Bay right at the window. Ordered fish & chips, lobster prawn roll and oysters, everything was delicious. Great service as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Daniela - thank you so much for sharing your feedback!

reviews.review_text: Really nice view from the tables. Food was good and the table service great. Its only a few steps from the beach and it is not really expensive

Creative and delicious cocktails at this place. I had 2 different cocktails, both were strong and bursting with flavour. We were dining on the deck in the fall with a party of four; the service was fast and friendly, very accommodating and knowledgable when told that one of us was Celiac. Alterations were made to that persons entree to make it gluten free. Lobster guacamole, salmon and fish and chips, it was all very good. I would push next time for my salmon to be a little rarer throughout, but it wasnt over-cooked. Well be back!
Delicious food, nice sea view, good ambience Really enjoyed our evening at hook Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time to connect with us and for the great review. Cheers, Caro!

reviews.review_text: VERY nice staff!! They are helpful when choosing the right beer and are extremely funny. We enjoyed the happy hour when the sun was shining. Great afternoon at this great place! Also try one of their bites, they are to die for. They are also part of the happy hour, so dont miss out
My server was Bre, her vibes were immaculate . Not only was she fast and efficient, she cracked great jokes, and made our experience even better. Great place, and a great worker
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Emma!

reviews.review_text: No clue why this place isn t packed. Ordered chorizo mussels and fish and chips. Both were banging.

This place is awesome. The food and service was on point and the atmosphere really felt cozy. All the food tasted fresh and they had a slew of options. I highly recommend this place and I will be going back. The server was knowledgeable and funny.
Great food and fantastic view of English bay. We had a very early dinner here and all 7 of us were very satisfied with our dishes.

Amazing is all I have to say about this restaurant. The food was absolutely delicious and our server, Bree was so friendly, attentive, informative and great with my kiddo. Best service Ive had in a long time. 11/10 recommended to dine here !!!
Great view of the beach, good beer but not cold enough, food is also quite good.
Great food and drinks. Amazing service. Jack our server was outstanding and friendly.
Awesome food, great view, nice service and fair price! I m definitely coming back. I really recommend the soft shell crab BLT sandwich and the ceviche!
A few beers overlooking the beach. Very nice and thanks to Andy for looking after us and making us drink just enough beer to make us feel a bit fuzzy A great place to chill and watch the world go by.

Great Place to watch the Sunset! Heaters were on for outside and they have blankets. Good service. Kalamari is non traditional. French fry size pieces cooked and battered to perfection. I dont even miss the tentacle parts which are usually my favorite. Friend had fish and chips and the fish was massive and thinly battered. Ceasar was great too, especially with the type of pickle they use for garnish. Will be back for sure!
Delicious sea food and gluten free options
We were there for a Sunday lunch. We tried mussel and clams, burger, fish tacos, and fish and chips which wete awesome.

Sunny evening, bustling restaurant. We took my mother-in-law for her birthday dinner. She loves fish and chips. Our waitress was delightful and very cheerful. She really made my mother-in-law s evening even bringing a special dessert. Thanks all it was a great evening. Oh, and the food was great!
We come here every summer and we had to get our happy hour fix and we love this place cause it s close to where we stay. Definitely recommended A+++++++

The best customer service I got in a while. And the best mezcal cocktail (those flavours will blow your mind - sweet, sour, bitter and smoky all in one). I don t remember the names, but a big shout out for a closing crew from yesterday (Hawaiian shirt and  just  5.0ft servers, you know who you are!). Funny, nice, willing to tolerate us. This is how serving should be done. Great job :)
Amazing view of english bay! Their food is good as well as their service.
Perfect spot to view the English Bay
Great seafood and local Beers with beautiful view at English Bay. We were there on wednesday, there was Nice live music and cheap pints of beer. Loved it
lovely experience here :) creole prawns were great, the decor and music here is nice! Eva helped us out and she was so fun, me and my friend adored her
Ambience, staff, and food were all 5 star however the wine list needs work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dianne, Thank you for your review! Would love to hear your suggestions on the wine list, please feel free to e-mail marisa@hookrestaurant.com. Cheers!

reviews.review_text: We had a large party at Hook and did their family style meal. Lots of great food choices and the food was really good. Service has been really great both times Ive been here. Limited wine choices but enough for any palate. Staff are amazing and helpful and friendly. This will be a regular stop me in Vancouver.

The fish and chips is excellent - you get a MASSIVE piece of fish, and its very tasty. Ask for extra tartar sauce though, because its also delicious and the little ramekin it comes with just isnt enough! The menu prices are also very reasonable - but if you factor in the location and the view of English Bay, theyre an absolute bargain. Definitely a lovely spot for a dinner at sunset.
Loved the crispy jumbo prawns & oysters. Epic spot for happy hour. Beautiful view of the ocean and service is awesome.

Amazing!!! To drink definitely try the pick me up so many wonderful flavors in one glass! And to eat Im in LOVE with their beet salad! I had the cutest server, she was so bubbly and on point. Fantastic experience and loved my ocean view from the patio
OMG. Fish and chip heaven. With a view of the ocean no less! And if you cant find parking there is a valet service in the back alley. Perfection!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for joining us Cindy! We are happy to share a piece of heaven with you. Come back soon and we will lift you off your feet with more tasty treats!

reviews.review_text: Fantastic sea food and drinks and the new manager Boston was a real gem

We had a really lovely happy hour here. Service was great and patio was super pleasant. The food - for Happy Hour- was terrific. Ceviche with lime and coconut milk, fried chicken a la Blind Sparrow, guacamole with house made chips, and an epic burger with the perfect light as air but stay together brioche bun. It s the kind of burger worthy of a top ten list. Brasserie L ecole or Veselkas type of good burger. Really good beer list as well. Really punched above its weight class. Look forward to coming by when on mainland.
The best place ever! Lovely & respectful staff, high quality food and services, pet lovers! Perfect view! Highly recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Mr. Hashemian! We are very much pet lovers and welcome dogs on our patio anytime!

reviews.review_text: Great food and great service Bre was quick and very friendly, will be back when Im in the area
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Sam!

reviews.review_text: Delicious food. Outstanding service. Physical distancing not so great. My wife and I had a date night at Hook and absolutely loved the food. We had oysters, fish tacos, mussels and clams, roasted sprouts and corn. All were incredible. The two cocktails that we shared were out of this world.  Our server was really nice and helpful. Overall we had an excellent time. However, we thought the physical distancing could use some work, as they ve taken a pretty lax approach and their staff don t appear to be actively encouraging physical distancing.

Hands down might be the best service Ive received at a restaurant in Vancouver. Chelsea was exceptionally friendly, knowledgeable and made us all feel so welcomed. The food was fresh and yummy but the star of our experience was Chelsea. 10/10 will come back just because of her amazing service and genuine personality.

Our severs name was Josh and he was awesome. Playful and Knowledgeable and recommend drinks for each if us based on what we like, he hit the mark perfectly. We had the happy hour coconut ceviche and fried chicken. Both were delicious. 100% would go back.
This place is new so we decided to try it with friends. A little pricey, but the food and service made up for everything. Just ask to sit outside because it gets really loud inside.

Went here for the first time over the weekend and loved it. Staff were friendly and they had various social distancing measures in place. Most of all, my boyfriend and I were impressed with their cocktail menu. The Sparrow & Lady Stanley were delicious! We will definitely be coming back.
